evidence.title: README (segment 1)
evidence.excerpt: A terminal-based internet radio player powered by [Radio Browser](https://www.radio-browser.info/).

evidence.title: README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt: - üîç **Search** - Find stations by name, tag, language, country, or state - üé≤ **I Feel Lucky** - Random station discovery by keyword - üíæ **Favorites** - Organize stations into custom lists with duplicate detection - ‚ö° **Quick Play** - Direct playback from main menu (shortcuts 10-99+) - üîä **Playback Control** - Play/pause with persistent status, adjust volume, and mute during playback - üö´ **Block List** - Block unwanted stations from appearing in searches and auto-play - ‚òÅÔ∏è **Gist Sync** - Backup and restore favorites via GitHub Gists - üó≥Ô∏è **Voting** - Support your favorite stations on Radio Browser - üìä **Most Played** - View your listening history sorted by play count, last played, or first played - üé® **Themes** - Choose from predefined themes or customize via unified config - üîÑ **Update Checker** - Get notified when a new version is available - ‚å®Ô∏è **Keyboard-driven** - Full navigation without a mouse - ‚ùì **Context Help** - Press `?` anytime to see available keyboard shortcuts

evidence.title: README (segment 3)
evidence.excerpt: üéâ **Unified Configuration System** - All settings now in one `config.yaml` file!

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: - **Simpler Configuration** - One file instead of multiple YAML files - **Automatic Migration** - v2 configs automatically converted on first run - **Secure Token Storage** - GitHub tokens now stored in OS keychain (optional) - **Better Organization** - Clear separation of config vs user data - **Easier to Edit** - All settings in one place with validation

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: See [MIGRATION.md](/docs/MIGRATION.md) for upgrade details and [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) for full changes.

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: ### Homebrew (macOS/Linux) ```sh # Install or update brew update && brew upgrade brew install shinokada/tera/tera # Upgrade existing installation brew upgrade shinokada/tera/tera ```

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: ### Debian/Ubuntu ```sh sudo dpkg -i tera_3.x.x_linux_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install -f # Install mpv dependency if needed ```

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: ### Windows Scoop ```sh scoop bucket add shinokada https://github.com/shinokada/scoop-bucket scoop install tera ```

evidence.title: v3.3.0
evidence.excerpt: ## TERA 3.3.0 ### Prerequisites - [mpv](https://mpv.io/) must be installed on your system ### Installation #### Homebrew (macOS/Linux) ```sh # update and upgrade brew update && brew upgrade brew install shinokada/tera/tera # Upgrade existing installation brew upgrade shinokada/tera/tera ``` ### Debian/Ubuntu ```sh sudo dpkg -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install -f # Install mpv dependency if needed ``` ### Fedora/RHEL ```sh sudo rpm -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.rpm ``` ### Windows Scoop ```sh scoop bucket add shinokada https://github.com/shinokada/scoop-bucket scoop install tera ``` #### Manual Installation ```sh # macOS/Linux - Download and extract, then move to PATH tar -xzf tera_3.3.0_<os>_<arch>.tar.gz sudo mv tera /usr/local/bin/ # Or install via Go go install github.com/shinokada/tera/v2/cmd/tera@3.3.0 ``` ## Changelog * 38f0dc0186cd6e1c12b2d5c31b1e303424ff79c4 feat: star rating * 4f37c6f6dcd353c91df354f1cc2c0f9dc0082cfc fix: add Esc hint to non-shuffle rating prompt; show voted status in lucky viewPlaying * 14fc1be1d6381fde134fa2e32076e53b28d6e11c fix: add ratingMode guard to updateShufflePlaying, clear rating state on auto-advance * e8496925ff1915d12ddc2a1bdb2e99‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v3.2.0
evidence.excerpt: ## TERA 3.2.0 ### Prerequisites - [mpv](https://mpv.io/) must be installed on your system ### Installation #### Homebrew (macOS/Linux) ```sh # update and upgrade brew update && brew upgrade brew install shinokada/tera/tera # Upgrade existing installation brew upgrade shinokada/tera/tera ``` ### Debian/Ubuntu ```sh sudo dpkg -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install -f # Install mpv dependency if needed ``` ### Fedora/RHEL ```sh sudo rpm -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.rpm ``` ### Windows Scoop ```sh scoop bucket add shinokada https://github.com/shinokada/scoop-bucket scoop install tera ``` #### Manual Installation ```sh # macOS/Linux - Download and extract, then move to PATH tar -xzf tera_3.2.0_<os>_<arch>.tar.gz sudo mv tera /usr/local/bin/ # Or install via Go go install github.com/shinokada/tera/v2/cmd/tera@3.2.0 ``` ## Changelog * fa02778fa07e0cea5077939c0453750a3e772e55 docs/fix: document UUID-only Station in sortedStationsLocked; clamp FormatDuration to 0 * 0cb4aa76b34a242728692db9832801a92fdd8e8e feat: station metadata, play count & last played * 7dc3ea3b43136c9fb247752cfa5f88c8400ec569 fix: About a year ago cap; FormatDuration seconds precision; cleanup tmp on WriteFile ‚Ä¶

evidence.title: v3.1.0
evidence.excerpt: ## TERA 3.1.0 ### Prerequisites - [mpv](https://mpv.io/) must be installed on your system ### Installation #### Homebrew (macOS/Linux) ```sh # update and upgrade brew update && brew upgrade brew install shinokada/tera/tera # Upgrade existing installation brew upgrade shinokada/tera/tera ``` ### Debian/Ubuntu ```sh sudo dpkg -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install -f # Install mpv dependency if needed ``` ### Fedora/RHEL ```sh sudo rpm -i tera_1.x.x_linux_amd64.rpm ``` ### Windows Scoop ```sh scoop bucket add shinokada https://github.com/shinokada/scoop-bucket scoop install tera ``` #### Manual Installation ```sh # macOS/Linux - Download and extract, then move to PATH tar -xzf tera_3.1.0_<os>_<arch>.tar.gz sudo mv tera /usr/local/bin/ # Or install via Go go install github.com/shinokada/tera/v2/cmd/tera@3.1.0 ``` ## Changelog * 3188763001b6a712d005f1b0a1f5370c184a6d0b Create CNAME * a48c7e59026bcfa57e462bbc388624b6597ad0d6 Delete CNAME * 6a20ba2600e95dff7b3cb036dd9f58b24990f9b3 fix: Added verification after SaveToken to confirm token landed in keychain before proceeding fix: Updated command reference to the correct token migration command fix: Updated expected value to ma‚Ä¶
